page.title: 01Epworth. A Brief Description
page.content: Epworth is quite a large village in {Humberside}situated between the towns of{Scunthorpe}and{Doncaster.}The population is approximately{3,100. {The Market Place}is central to the village and nearly all the shops are situated here. The area is within five minutes walk for the majority of the town's residents though those living along{West End Rd, The Turbary,}and a few other outlying areas face a journey of up to 2 or 3 miles. Epworth is an expanding town and three new housing estates have recently been built. A further estate is presently under construction and other development is planned. Although only a small town, Epworth can boast its own Police, Ambulance- and Fire stations.
